title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 454 - Correction Factors
content:

State Regulations
§ 454.1 - Scope of the rules in this part
§ 454.2 - Microphone distance correction factors
§ 454.3 - Ground surface correction factors
§ 454.4 - Computation of open-site requirements-nonstandard sites
§ 454.5 - Application of correction factors

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 454

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 19-0301, 19-0303; Vehicle and Traffic Law, §386 as
amended by chapter 543 of the Laws of
1976

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
